text: “Ndipo khalani mnyumba zanu, ndipo musadzionetsere (kwa amuna) uku mutadzikongoletsa monga mmene ankaonetsera zokongoletsa zawo (akazi) a m’nthawi ya umbuli wakale. Ndipo pempherani Swala moyenera, perekani Zakaat, mverani Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake. Ndithu Allah akufuna kukuchotserani uve e, inu a kunyumba (ya Mneneri)! Ndi kuti akuyeretseni ndithu
